result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Timmy L. Brooks
Current: KCDC, 4777 88th Avenue, Kenosha, WI 53144 United States  (Effective: 10-26-2022)
Prior: 2027 60th Place, Kenosha, WI 53143

11:16 AM Defendant Timmy L. Brooks in court, in custody.  Attorney Chad A Shamali and Atty Balistrieri in court for Timmy L. Brooks.  Attorney Michael David Graveley and Atty Tambosco in court for State of Wisconsin.  Clerk HM.  State is compliant with victim rights notification.  On state's motion, ct 2 is DRI.  DE enters guilty plea to ct 1.  Court finds DE guilty of ct 1.  PSI ordered.  SEH 1/5 3pm.   Bond continued.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 5, 2023 at 03:00 pm.

2:03 PM Defendant Timmy L. Brooks appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Chad A Shamali  and Atty Balistrieri in court for Timmy L. Brooks.  Attorney Michael David Graveley and Atty Tombasco in court for State of Wisconsin. Clerk HM.   Matters resolved.  PLEAS 10/26 11am. Bond continued.
Plea hearing scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 11:00 am.

State of Wisconsin appears by District Attorney Michael Graveley.  Defendant in custody and appeared by zoom w/ Attorney Shamali.   Clerk HMcBride.  Atty Shamali requests another STC in 60 days.  No objection. Granted. STC 10/24 2pm. Trial dates remain as scheduled.   Bond continued.

State of Wisconsin appears by District Attorney Michael Graveley.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Bub and Atty Balistrieri.   Clerk HMcBride.    State is compliant with victim rights notification.  No offer made.  STC 8/29 2pm.  JSH 1/12 11am. JS 1/23 830am.  All other cases trail.  Bond continued.

Attorney Andrew Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Bub.    Clerk HMcBride.  Atty Bub requests adjmt  - working on discovery. PTC 6/23 9am.   Bond cotinued.

Defendant, Timmy L. Brooks, appeared with Attorney Christopher R. Bub.  Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Case bound over.   Information filed, reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 30, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
